name: A Hero's Tale (Valia, Vio Audio, Kaideu)
name_original: A Hero's Tale (Valia, Vio Audio, Kaideu)
description:
Fight as a slime to save your love one. 

Swallow evil human to gain abilities.

---------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD  - move

LMB - spit

RMB - eat

Space - Hero mode (when energy is full)

---------------------------------------------------------

Features:

  • Swallow human to get their abilities.
  • 7 Different kinds of evil human, and an epic boss fight.
  • Accumulate energy to enter Hero mode, highly boost your abilities.
